# Government Tender Announcement
## Replacement of the Chilled Water Tank at the Research and Development Center

### Tender Information

* Tender Title: EF944-240965 - Replacement of the Chilled Water Tank at the Research and Development Center
* Solicitation Number: WS4274251803
* Tender Closing Date: January 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM
* Amendment Number: 9
* Publication Date: November 29, 2023

### Project Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this invitation to tender for the replacement of the chilled water tank at the Research and Development Center, located at 3600 Boulevard Casavant, St-Hyacinthe, Québec.

The scope of work includes the construction of a new chilled water tank, which will replace the existing one. The work will be performed in accordance with the requirements outlined in the solicitation document, which contains all the necessary details regarding the project.

### Tender Requirements

* The tendering process is open to all qualified contractors.
* The selection criteria for this project are based on the lowest price submitted.
* Bidders are required to demonstrate their ability to meet the contract requirements and complete the project within the specified timeframe.

### Contact Information

For more information regarding this tender, please contact:

Andy Doucette
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Email: andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: January 29, 2024, at 2:00 PM
* Amendment Date: January 24, 2024
